name: Iced Refreshments
description:
Winter's the perfect time for an iced drink! Mix and serve the perfect chilly beverages with the fun cast of... whoever thought this was a good idea. Let everybody help you try and serve as many drinks as you can!

Controls:

A/D: Move left/right between stands

Mouse/Left-click: Click and drag objects

Made for the Touhou Winter Jam.

This is a fanwork of the Touhou project, which belongs to Team Shanghai Alice.

The crystals grow back don't worry!
